title: Chambers expands in Germany
text:
0 comments Tom Newcombe Mon, 26 Oct 2015 11:44 Follow @thomasnewcombe Chambers Travel Management is boosting its presence in Berlin after experiencing substantial growth in the region. 

The TMC saw growth of 72 per cent and won 14 new clients across Germany during the companyâ€™s financial year ending June 2015. 

Chambers, which has had a presence in Germany for five years, has moved into new premises in Berlin. The new office has capacity for 40 staff. 

It has appointed Boris Doerwald as European operational development manager to head up the Berlin office. 

Chambers has also appointed three additional operations consultants in Berlin within the last two months and plans to recruit a further two consultants by December 2015.
